lines: What do you think of our marids? In times of peace, their ssstrength makes light of the most demanding physical work. But in times of war, a rampaging marid is unssstoppable.
We Ananta ride marids by twisssting our tails around their trunks. I always find it ssstrange to see you ssstriders riding on their backsss.

obj.n: C'est comme ça qu'on attire les fourmis
